Spells:
Animate Dead (Ch4 Necr): Touched corpses become up to 20 HD of obedient skeletons or zombies

Fly (Ch3 Tran): Touched gains 60' fly speed for 10 min

Lie (Ch1 Tran): Self gains +10 Bluff on next lie
Light (W0 Evoc): Touched gives 20' bright light for 100 min
Message (Ch0 Tran): R200' 10 targets hold whispered dialogue for 100 min
Open/Close (W0 Tran): R50' Target up to 30 lb opens or closes (DC 12 Will neg)
Overland Flight (Ch5 Tran): Self gains 40' fly speed for 10 hr

Suggestion (Ch3 Ench): R50' Target follows reasonable suggestion (DC 15 Will neg) for 10 hr

Symbol Of Sleep (Ch5 Ench): R60' Rune sleeps creatures w/10 HD or less for 3d6x10 min (DC 17 Will neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 100 min
Touch Of Fatigue (Ch0 Necr): Touch inflicts fatigue for 10 rd (DC 12 Fort neg)
Warp Wood (Ch2 Tran): R50' Warps 10 wooden objects in 20' radius (DC 14 Will neg)

Art Of Magic: +1 character level for maximum spell level

Bonus Spells: +18 Channeler Spells

Spellcasting (Necromancy): Knows 1 Channeler Necromancy spell and may learn more
Spellcasting (Transmutation): Knows 1 Channeler Transmutation spell and may learn more
Craft Wondrous Item: May create and mend miscellaneous magic items
Enlarge Spell: May use +1 spell slot to dbl chosen spell range
Maximize Spell: May use +3 spell slot to maximize all variable effects on chosen spell
Sense Nexus: Successful DC 15 Wisdom senses nexus w/in 5 miles
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
Still Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out movement
